data.title: Moon Taxi - "Hometown Heroes"
data.meta_description: New single from Moon Taxi is out now. This has picked up a few AAA adds. It's also under Cool New Music for Alternative and AAA. They're with BMG now.
data.text:
Post by maine on

New single from Moon Taxi is out now. This has picked up a few AAA adds. It's also under Cool New Music for Alternative and AAA. They're with BMG now.

Post by No Brake$ on

This is a bad song and I can’t understand why anyone would invest in sending something like this to radio. The lyrics are awful.

Post by narp on

This either sounds like something that spends one week on the alt chart and falls off or the alt crossover that gets sent to pop and spends way too much time on the chart and at #1. That’s how generic it is.

Post by maine on

"Now's the Time" was really solid; I don't know why they didn't sent that. It sounded very radio friendly.

This is really meh, as most of their material has been for the past couple of years. Shame because I really liked them at a point, but they kinda lost me with this past album.

Post by Deleted on

the SiriusXM jam band station is playing this for whatever reason

Post by No Brake$ on

Moon Taxi has had some decent songs, they are based out of Nashville and pretty much AAA Pop. There is no way even the band thinks this song is good, for them, this is complete garbage.

Post by thirddegree50123 on

No reason for this not to be huge lol

Post by Doc Indie Party Rock on

This song made me laugh, but not in a good way.

Post by American Idiot on

Besides that background noise that I don't even know what it is, but I feel like Walk The Moon used it in "One Foot," I enjoyed that song. That chorus is damn catchy and reminds me something from like Vance Joy or The Head and the Heart.

Post by maine on

For such a poppy song, the lack of rhymes stick out like a sore thumb to me. Normally this doesn't bother me, but on this one it does.

I don't think this is that bad, but it's a far cry from a solid chunk of their discography.

Post by Daryl the Beryl on

Top 50 on AAA:

65 49 MOON TAXI Hometown Heroes 82 49 33 0.051

Post by Daryl the Beryl on

Top 40 on AAA:

42 39 MOON TAXI Hometown Heroes 118 92 26 0.106

This is lame.

Post by Daryl the Beryl on

Top 30 on AAA:

39 30 MOON TAXI Hometown Heroes 160 118 42 0.101
